text: Is there a way to know from julia for what target architecture it is currently generating code?

elements.text: Is there a way to know from julia for what target architecture it is currently generating code?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>
there's other stuff in Sys that maybe you want

elements.text: there's other stuff in Sys that maybe you want

text:
```CpuId.jl is helpful.
# on my laptop
CpuId.cpuvendor() == :Intel
CpuId.cpubrand() == "Intel(R) Xeon(R) E-2176M  CPU @ 2.70GHz"
CpuId.cpuarchitecture() == :Kabylake```
